author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania, disoccupati destagionalizzati marzo in calo di 19,000, tasso a minimo storico 5,3% Macroeconomia
text:
BERLIN, March 29 (Reuters) - Germany's Federal Labour Office reported the following economic indicator on Thursday : GERMAN UNEMPLOYMENT MAR 18 Feb 18 MAR 17 Change (adj) -19,000 -23,000 -26,000 Number (adj) 2.373 mln 2.392 mln 2.566 mln Rate (adj) 5.3 pct 5.4 pct 5.8 pct Change (unadj) -87,826 -24,375 -99,984 Number (unadj) 2.458 mln 2.546 mln 2.662 mln Rate (unadj) 5.5 pct 5.7 pct 6.0 pct (Reporting by Berlin Newsroom)
